sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词均有"公正的，公平的，不偏不倚的"之意。
means: impartial ： 侧重对任何人或任何一方没有成见或偏袒。
just ： 多用于庄重场合，指不受个人利益得失或感情倾向的影响，侧重按照公认的准则或标准处理问题。
fair ： 普通常用词，指不偏不倚地对待人和物，侧重不受个人感情、偏见或利益所影响。
neutral ： 强调持中立态度，不偏袒任何一方，甚至不作最后的裁决。
objective ： 着重客观、真实，不为个人偏见、兴趣、感情或看法所左右。

sentence.Network_en: As an impartial observer my analysis is supposed to be objective.
sentence.Network_cn: 作为中立的观察员，我的分析应该客观。

sentence.Network_en: He gave an impartial view of the state of affairs in Ireland.
sentence.Network_cn: 他对爱尔兰的事态发表了公正的看法.

sentence.Network_en: I shall be impartial, though I can not be neuter.
sentence.Network_cn: 虽然我不能保持中立, 我也不偏袒任何一方.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 形容人性格的词汇 ... humorous 有幽默； impartial 公正的 independent 有主见的；.
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... impolite 无礼的 impartial 公平的 impassive 无动于衷的.
表态度的英语单词_百度知道 ... neutral adj. 中立的 impartial adj. 公平的, 不偏不倚的 disinterested adj. 无私的.
考博英语词汇 ... impart v. 把…分给；给予 impartial a. 公正的，无偏见的 impatience n. 不耐烦，急躁；渴望，切望.

entry.tran: 不偏不倚的;公正的;无偏见的
entry.def: Someone who is impartial is not directly involved in a particular situation, and is therefore able to give a fair opinion or decision about it.

example.ex: As an impartial observer my analysis is supposed to be objective...
example.tran: 作为中立的观察员,我的分析应该客观。

example.ex: Careers officers offer impartial advice to all pupils.
example.tran: 就业指导员向所有学生提供公正无私的建议。

sentences.sentence: "the cold neutrality of an impartial judge"

means.word_mean: 2. free from undue bias or preconceived opinions;

sentences.sentence: "an unprejudiced appraisal of the pros and cons"

auth_sentence.content: One, monolithic, impartial view was unnecessary.

auth_sentence.content: Science should at least appear to be impartial.

im无+partial有偏见的→无偏见的
